column1: vicki h. lauckhardt obituary| vicki h. lauckhardt
column6: 2015 at her residence following a lengthy illness. she was born in long island
column8: 1973 and has been a resident for half her life her locally. she was a homemaker and of the episcopal faith. survivors include her husband of 20 plus years
column9: william ken lauckhardt of valdosta; her daughters
column13: and joanna lauckhardt of valdosta; her granddaughter
column14: aria baker of new york; her father
column15: william taylor of new york; a brother
column18: john fuzia all of new york; a sister
column20: florida; numerous nieces and nephews. she was preceded in death by her mother
column21: patricia brugel fuzia. a service for vicki h. lauckhardt will be held on tuesday
column23: 2015 at 11 a. m. in the chapel of the mc. lane lakewood funeral home with reverend isaac salgado officiating. the family will receive friends on monday from 2-4 p. m. and again from 7-9 p. m. at the mc. lane lakewood funeral home. mrs. lauckhardt will be cremated following the services and the burial will take place at a later date and time in new york. condolences to the family may be conveyed online at www. mclanecares. com. mc. lane lakewood. read vicki h. lauckhardt's and on mclanefuneralservices. com.
